item.title: I got a last chance to appeal my ban.. what do i write?
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

For scamming the ebst way tog et your account back is say that a school mate guessed your password and used your account to scam with. Tell them you have revised you question and made you password alpha-numeric and that you will be more careful about tlaking about possible password topics with that kid in the future.

I have no history of item scamming, but i have had 2 accounts unbanned for foul language and the like suign the above method.

item.title: I got a last chance to appeal my ban.. what do i write?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Dear Jagex: thank you for allowing me a second change to your completely non horribly fucking retarded game of runescape. I have learnt my lesson during this time, and won’t commit the miniscule offense that has made you explode like firey meteors into unwarrented rage. I will fully utilize my hopefully [not] short time on runescape to enhance its community, and not cheat and encourage others to do so once I have exchanged my goods for cash in reality, a place you most likely haven’t forgotten about.

Sincerely, your loyal fan who doesn’t hate you into the depths of his soul [yournamehere]

Read full topic
